benchmark_details.name: COBLOCK (Collaborative Blocks World)
benchmark_details.overview: A collaborative blocks world environment where human or LLM agents work together to build target structures by taking actions and communicating in natural language. Evaluates agents' collaborative capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Evaluate the collaboration ability of LLMs in a controlled blocks-world environment.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on task success and action distribution between agents.
methodology.interpretation: High success rates and balanced workload indicate better collaboration.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: No personal information was recorded from participants.
